name: CouponPlanet
tag_list: coupon-code, promotion-code, travel-coupons, gift-service, discount-code, promo-code
overview:
CouponPlanet recently launched its website aiming to be India’s largest deals, coupon and discount portal for online shoppers.

Couponplanet is a deals, discount coupons and coupon code sharing portal. You can find latest coupons and coupon codes for major Indian stores for a vast selection of categories – ranging from items like Electronics, Books, Apparels, Flowers, Flights, Tickets, Gifts to services like Insurance, Restaurants, Movies, Travel and many more.

http://www.couponplanet.in/: The website do not require users to sign up before viewing the codes and promotional deals are distributed completely free.

The startup is based in Chandigarh and managed by budding entrepreneurs.
